validators.message: Patient marked as on TB in TB History section. Therefore plan can only be drug substitution, continue regimen, change dose, change regimen
Patient marked as not on TB in TB History section. Therefore plan can only be None, start
Patient marked as confirmed for TB in TB Screening section. Therefore plan can only start

questions.label: If plan is to stop/change/re-dose/substitute, reason:

validators.message: You indicated patient is changing/changing dose/substituting/stopping TB, reason for changing should be selected.
You indicated patient is changing /changing dose/substituting/stopping arvs due to toxicity, cause should be selected.
You indicated patient is not changing/dose/substituting/stopping arvs due to toxicity, cause should be selected.
You indicated patient is restarting tb medication, therefore reason should be selected.
You did not indicate restart tb medication, therefore reason should not be selected.
